name: Pathramid
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Aliens are returning to take back what is rightfully theirs, but the Ancient Egypt Gods disagree! 

Help them protect the treasure hidden in the depths of the pyramid. 
Many enemies will come and you will have to be more careful: don't let they take the Ankh!

FEATURES:

  • Waves of enemies of different types
  • Choose the minions path by switching the crossroads
  • Use bombs to kill all enemies on screen
  • Different control systems

DEVELOPED BY TEAMBALLO

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 1, 2019/2020)
